title: Kernel still anoying me pls help me :/
body:
Hi everybody i really need your help, LoL stopped to work today and it still saying that kernel had stoppped working, i tried a lot of things : reinstall, change lol air thing, download a new rads_kernel.exe or something like that... But it still not working... {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 
It says that i got a problem with BEX rads_user_kernel.exe so i went to microsoft support and i did what they said me to do but it don't change something. Can somoene help me ? (PLS i'm a french guy and i can only understand easy english words, ty btw ^^)

replies.body: Same problem here, ive tried everything but still pvp.net  patcher kernel has stopped working. It makes me cry {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

i'm in new caledonia... and my problem doesnt evolve so pls help me i tried all, i said ALL the solutions in the support thing like force a repacth download this dowload that run as administrator, run on vista XP and 7 (i'm on W7), add rads_kernel_user to the applications that windows cant control or block but my problem don't change it always stop working pls Riot help me :(
